name: ZoChronicles (WIP)
description:
*Warning*Contains flashing images

Survival horde type game, try and survive for as long as you can

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Left Mouse Button - Short range attack

Right Mouse Button - Long range attack

Stances:

Each stance has different effects and damage

  • #1 - Wolf
  • #2 - Brawler (stronger melee but no gun)
  • #3 - Demon
